title: Friends account hacked
body:
Dear Riot,

 Recently i have been getting messages from my friend saying to go on this website and i immediately knew he had been hacked
i was wondering if you could ban or close  as i am very sure that many people are falling for this. here is the link for the website, --snip--, and here is my friend's account profile name. --snip--

Thank you for taking your time to read this and i hope you take action accordingly. I also apologise for my friend's foolish action and hope you can reinstate his account.

replies.body: I've snipped out the link for security reasons.  I appreciate you reaching out for your friend, and we'd like to help.  If possible, reach out to him and let him know to [secure his account](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  He can also hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) where we can assist personally with recovery.  Thanks for the heads up!
Thank you very much for your support
It's been 4 years since they announced they were working on 2FA. 2017, and we don't even have it yet.
